website_summaries.verdict: Large piece of furniture that will give you plenty of storage space for all of your media.
pros: Dimensions of 39 by 51 inches with multiple adjustable shelves so you can organize your media exactly how you want
Holds up to 270 DVD cases with shelves of 5 1/2-inch depth
Can secure to the wall for safety
Available in two different wood colors
cons: Must be assembled, which can be a frustrating process

customer_reviews.title: Solid and Well Made
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for something that I could use to store/organize my DVDs/Blu-rays/video games, and this does the job quite nicely. The product itself is high quality and sturdy; once it's assembled, you may be surprised by how heavy it actually is. Because I placed it on carpet I used the optional wall screw/zip tie securing feature, which is great if you have kids (as I do). As you can see in the picture, there's a lot of storage available, but I filled it up almost immediately. Basically, I underestimated how much media I have. If you have a lot of DVDs/etc., you may want to opt for something just a bit bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating Assembly
customer_reviews.text: While the construction is pretty solid and the finish is nice, the unit arrived with absolutely no pilot holes in the base. I had to manually drill holes for the screws, which was a total guessing game for me (I'm not terribly handy with that kind of stuff). The rest of the unit had the correct pilot holes in the right areas and the manual indicated the bottom piece should have had them too. It was frustrating and, although it's standing, I'm afraid it's going to collapse once I load it up with my movie collection.
customer_reviews.author: Rhys A Martin

customer_reviews.title: Given the materials, it still looks dignified when fully loaded up with CDs
customer_reviews.text: This is my third piece of furniture made by Prepac, and like the others it is well-made and shipped in as compact a form as possible. They're made by our neighbor to the north (in British Columbia, Canada). I'm going to have to disagree with the other review posted for this item: it is better to have two pieces for the back rather than one. Why? If it were one piece, you'd have a difficult time lining up nails for the back with the vertical midsection. It took me about an hour to put this together. It's helpful to have a dust buster since there's plenty of sawdust to deal with (from the engineered woods / medium density fiberboard).
customer_reviews.author: Frosty Cold One

customer_reviews.title: Easy to build & holds 100's in a small space
customer_reviews.text: This CD strorage rack arrived timely and was well packaged. It was not difficult to put together. The instructions were easy to follow. The shelves are adjustable, so it will hold DVDs also. I only give 3 stars because it is supposed to have 14 shelves and there were only 13. I don't need a 14te shelf because I am storing a mix of CDs and DVDs. If I intended to fill it with only CDs the last shelf would be a necessity. Otherwise - a good item.
customer_reviews.author: ErinLeigh

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and very functional shelf
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and very functional shelf. The backing is cheap cardboard, but this will be hidden by CDs. I like that it is not deep- holds a lot of CDs without being visually dominant, or taking up much wall space. I did not anchor it to a wall, and it appears sturdy, even on thick carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Nice display rack at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived on time as described. It looks nice and does what it's advertised to do. The only reason for not giving a 5 star rating is that the materials are just laminated particle board (heavy but fragile), and could stand to be a bit more durable, but otherwise it works as a nice looking media shelf. The item I ordered did have some damage that occurred either during shipping or at the warehouse, but when I contacted the company about the issue they promptly responded and took care of sending me replacement parts for the one's that were damaged. Based on the excellent customer service, I would recommend items from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Cressida_Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to accompany larger 3 column unit to house large CD/DVD collection. Matched well. Not hard to assemble, relatively sturdy against a wall. Like the adjustable shelving.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn R. Berg

customer_reviews.title: It was fairly easy to assemble and set up
customer_reviews.text: A very handsome looking cabinet. It was fairly easy to assemble and set up. Not nearly enough space though for all the cd's, dvd's and blu-rays that are in my collection. Will most likely need at least two more to store everything but first have to find room for another two cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth A. Hall

customer_reviews.title: NIce Sturdy Construction,  Fair Value
customer_reviews.text: Very nice construction. Sturdy, about a 2 hour assembly time. Be sure to install on a flat no rug floor. Be sure to align backer with edge of unit, not floor base, a s the glides raise up the unit. Very precise easy to understand instructions. Best to wipe down all parts first as they are a little dusty from the mill. Nice to see made by our Canadian neighbors. Will be able to organize many CD's.
customer_reviews.author: LAR

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and looks great
customer_reviews.text: L.O.V.E. it!! Easy to assemble and looks great. Take your time with the nails on the back and you will have no trouble. Some complained about the smell but allI I smell is cut wood. If you don't like the smell of cut wood, then don't buy this. A tip: If you are putting this on carpet, save the cardboard end caps when unpacking. They make great shims under the front edge to give it a secure footing so that it doesn't tip over.
customer_reviews.author: jobuh

customer_reviews.title: Lovely looking cabinet, with large storage capacity.
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet arrived promptly, but had two missing shelves. A person at the company's toll-free number quickly and courteously returned my call, and shipped the missing shelves. All in all, a very worthwhile purchase, given my ever-growing CD collection. I have bought products from this company before, and am very satisfied with the quality of their furniture and ease of assembly. Once put together, they are sturdy and very attractive-looking. And, the price is very competetive.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Best paperback bookcase I could find
customer_reviews.text: This Media Rack is excellent for US mass market paperbacks. This was the only "bookcase" I could find to hold all of my paperbacks without wasted space. For my purposes this bookcase is about 2 feet shorter than ideal. I'll soon be ordering more as I'm out of space. Note: I have carpet and to stabilize these bookcases I used 6 of the following on each. "Screw On Type Plastic Base Furniture Sofa Glide Leveling Foot 10 PCS" :
customer_reviews.author: edink

customer_reviews.title: Media Holder AKA Great Jelly Roll Storage
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these. They are easy to put together and do what they should do. I actually am using this to store jelly rolls (fabric for quilters) and it is really handy.
customer_reviews.author: Theaterdreamer

customer_reviews.title: OK, but...
customer_reviews.text: The media rack is just fine, but the guy that drills the holes in the base for the vertical pieces needs a slap upside his head, because he drilled the holes in the wrong place. Yes, I have a drill & drill bits, so I was able to drill the holes correctly, but what the heck am I paying for?
customer_reviews.author: Mike Plechaty

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I thought it would be and the perfect size for where I wanted it! Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren S. Edson-Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good media shelf for storage
customer_reviews.text: This shelf is fairly durable, although the instructions were a bit hard to follow at times, everything had to be assembled. It does have a large amount of DVD storage room, although the shelf placement makes a little bit harder to maximize the storage space as advertised. Certainly a decent shelf for the price.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: CDs Fit Great!
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a way to display and store your CDs, this wall media storage rack is a great fit. It doesn't take up too much space while it has the potential of storing about 550 CDs. The picture matches the product and we are pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: JJ in GT

customer_reviews.title: Looks very nice, worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the space I had. Very much worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: He said it was perfect, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my nephew and it was very well received. He said it was perfect, easy to assemble, and has plenty big enough to hold his entire collection of media. I think I earned enough brownie points on this one to go a long way! :)
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty!
customer_reviews.text: These shelves are very nice looking, the color is gorgeous. It holds 280 DVDs on the 10 shelves that will fit DVDs. The way we set it up, there's an extra space where we can fit more DVDs sideways, but this is obviously deisgned to fit all CDs. Very sturdy, doesn't lean! Will be getting another one once our movie collection expands!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Bought in 2012 and still awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We've enjoyed this shelf for many years and also purchased a larger version as well. Both have help up well through several rough moves and they were the best looking shelfs to display our movies at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Good!
customer_reviews.text: Some seem to have unrealistic expectations of this Media Rack. When thinking of buying it REMEMBER it is made of particle board. They did a good job boring the holes and finishing it. Packing was good nothing broken. Instructions very clear. Best that Purchaser be patient when assembling. I was, no errors. I am impressed by the simple design. Adjustable shelving simple and good.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B

customer_reviews.title: Count your audio visual material before you hit buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shelf for the price. Holds my media well, neat and close up to the wall. But I did not do a good job of counting my cases before I ordered and could have done well with an extra three shelves. Just a note if you are looking to get this or any media shelving, measure the linear space you need and order a little bit larger....or you will be back for more.
customer_reviews.author: ebullock

customer_reviews.title: Nice CD cabinet.
customer_reviews.text: It looks good and assembled easily. It is tall and thin but surprisingly stable. It is sturdy enough that I was able to move it away from the wall loaded with CDs- and then move it back.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Prepac Cherry Double Width Wall Media storage unit is great! It doesn't take up a lot of floor ...
customer_reviews.text: Prepac Cherry Double Width Wall Media storage unit is great! It doesn't take up a lot of floor space but it does hold a lot of DVDs!
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: I ordered two units of an identical type and am happy with their overall appearance and ease of assembly
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived with no damage.The only negative is that there was a lot of wood dust on the components. A damp cloth was needed to wipe everything down before assembly. I ordered two units of an identical type and am happy with their overall appearance and ease of assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: A good shelf
customer_reviews.text: I've had this shelf for over a month and it is nice, for the price. I would have given five stars rather than four though if Prepac, the manufacturer, had included all of the parts in the box. It was missing one of the two back pieces. When they sent a replacement, they also chose the slowest possible shipping method. The shelf itself is nice, but the company's packing/customer service departments could use some improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Adam C.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to put together,about an hour.Instructions were easy to follow.Will be using it for cds and dvds but for now just using it to display odds and ends.Shelf is pretty nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, everything lined up. Easy to understand and complete instructions. Received in excellent condition and as scheduled. Good quality and fair price.
customer_reviews.author: JCRYAN

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice shelf for CD's...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my cd collection I had sitting around in storage. I also use if for my movies and video games. The thing was super easy to put together and the shelfs are easy to adjust. Me and my wife assembled this in about an hr. I hate putting things together but this was fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This was actually pretty easy to assemble alone, it took less than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Valenziano

customer_reviews.title: Good media storage.
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty but the instructions leave some thing to be desired. It took two of us quite a while to figure it out. Does not really hold as much as advertised due to the placement of the shelves. If you store CD's and DVD's you will not get as much storage as you would expect due to the pre-drilled holes for shelf placement. Overall it's pretty good at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Shar

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but not great
customer_reviews.text: A little expensive and smaller than I expected but works and serves it purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Landis

customer_reviews.title: The storage is great, although the last shelf didn't allow for dvd ...
customer_reviews.text: We just purchased this last month. The storage is great, although the last shelf didn't allow for dvd unless they slid in sideways. Otherwise, all the parts were delivered, the instructions were clear, and nothing was damaged. The unit does what it was intended to do and looks really nice. For the price we paid, this purchase was well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This media rack is really well made
customer_reviews.text: This media rack is really well made. The box had a nice dent in it when delivered, making me fear for the worst, but all the parts were in perfect order. Assembly was very straight-forward. Wooden parts looks good. What really impresses me is that the nail-on back is actually a decent thickness MDF instead of black cardboard like most low-cost units you can buy. This thing looks good and feels solid. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Stroh

customer_reviews.title: Very functional and sturdy; good value.
customer_reviews.text: This holds a lot of DVD's in a way that they can easily be searched for whatever you are looking for. Excellent value. I had a professional handyman put it together so I have no opinion on how easy or hard it is to assemble. I have it near a spin-around DVD holder. They make a good pair due to the type of space I have available.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith E.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Plenty attractive enough for my office, and reasonably sturdy for an inexpensive knock-down. Assembly was a bit tough for me, but that's more due to my age than to design. Hold lots of media, and for my use, even has spare room for some nicknacks.
customer_reviews.author: R. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and east to put up
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to hold my CDs and DVDs. It looks nice and held everything I owned.
customer_reviews.author: William Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, and holds "almost" our entire collection
customer_reviews.text: I set it up in about 45 minutes. Looks great, and holds "almost" our entire collection. Fits well in the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Tim G

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, easy to put together, sturdy would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry D. Sadler

customer_reviews.title: Good Unit
customer_reviews.text: I use the unit for CDs, and it holds more than I thought it would. The shelf supports had to be hammered in. Otherwise the construction was pretty easy. I'll probably order another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Terrell Kent Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Just what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I have an older house the bows toward its center (not a good home for floor lamps) and I thought we would need to attach this to the wall to keep it upright. No need, the extra depth on the footing gives it added stability. It holds everything well, went together easily and look great on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit but you need to be extra careful hammering the nails in straight on the back panels.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this unit. I bought it for holding all my DVDs and CDs. But you really need to be careful when hammering in the little nails that hold the back panels on this. I didn't notice until I was all done that I had put a few nails poking out of the finished side panels, messing up the finish slightly. Because the wood is so narrow where you hammer the nails in, you have to be super careful to hammer in the nails perfectly straight.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas N.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I needed a case to house all our cd's. This looks very nice in our music room. I'm pleasantly surprised at how well built and sturdy it is.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hooten

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive media case
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with its appearance. The shelves are easily adjustable, and it looks like furniture. Assembly was quick (and I'm a 64-yo couch potato) and although I don't think it'll survive a big earthquake, it's quite sturdy for everyday use. Overall, I got every bit what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Stelios Touchtidis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good product for the price. It was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Great unit; assembly required
customer_reviews.text: This unit gave me everything I had been looking for in CD storage.This includes accommodating a husband who has saved every CD he bought in the last 30 years :( It is sturdy, attractive and functional. There is only one down side--"some assembly required" is understated. The instructions are clear if you know how to put things together, understand the downside of a cam, know how to use a drill gun and drive a nail. You must be able to get on your knees and have a space large enough to put the unit together. The assembly is not for a novice but the CD storage is great for the price. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Wildfirekoc

customer_reviews.title: nice CD shelf
customer_reviews.text: nice CD shelf, fits about 620-640 CDs and has wall anchor to keep it from tipping forward (highly recommended) It does have a wider base for stability, but the 2 screws are worth the effort. not bad for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Trocar1

customer_reviews.title: again wife loves this and i am happy
customer_reviews.text: very slim lines and well built not one issue putting this together and I hate furniture assembly an extra set of hands is in order though but not heavy so even the kids could help
customer_reviews.author: George Kyriacos

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice
customer_reviews.text: This is a good choice if you want a respectable quality media storage unit. It was easy to assemble and is surprisingly stable. It looks great. Unless you want to go to a furniture shop and buy a "real" heavy duty unit for a ton of money, this is the best unit to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Army Mom

customer_reviews.title: not fine furniture but well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: a good product for the money. As others have noted the instructions leave a bit to be desired. I suggest reading them through once before beginning assembly (like a recipe). Spacing is shelves is well-designed for optimizing capacity when using either CDs or DVDs.
customer_reviews.author: justaguy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I use it for storing CD and 14 shelves hold approx. 670 - 720 CD (depending on CD jewel case size). For me, the product is exactly what I've been looking for. Very reasonable price and made professionally. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Zelimir Mandusic

customer_reviews.title: It looks very nice it was very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: It looks very nice it was very easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: doug

customer_reviews.title: This shelf is perfect to store these tapes
customer_reviews.text: This shelf is perfect to store these tapes. It fits in a corner & it is the perfect size. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Blanc

customer_reviews.title: OK Product for the $
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with a scrape which I filled in with a stain stick; otherwise, it looks ok. Note that the dimension of 8.75 inches is the bottom platform. The shelves are actually only 4.5 inches deep with a 3/4 inch gap in the back (shelves are not tight to the backing). This will not matter if you are using it to hold CD's and such; however, I wanted to display trophies and small figurines with legs of which some would fall through this opening.
customer_reviews.author: GH

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shelf but not as big as I thought it would be
customer_reviews.author: B. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Dose what I needed it for. Happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. Kozicki

customer_reviews.title: My nephew loved it. Perfect size for a movie
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loved it. Perfect size for a movie lover
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: great product, satisfied with purchase.....
customer_reviews.text: as advertised, good product, clean design and manufacturing..... satisfied customer
customer_reviews.author: jonjy998

customer_reviews.title: its cheap but looks good. its top heavy and will tip over
customer_reviews.text: its cheap but looks good. its top heavy and will tip over. i used an L bracket on each side to anchor it to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Holds quite a few CD's.
customer_reviews.text: I've got over 700 CD's in this cabinet and there is room for more, I am really pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: R J R

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it does the job, but it is cheaply made particle board. The packaging was damaged on arrival and therefore, some of the shelves were damaged. Thankfully in the configuration I needed, I had 2 unused shelves.
customer_reviews.author: C. Nash

customer_reviews.title: Excellent CD rack
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, was easy to put together, just what I was hoping for!
customer_reviews.author: TROY WOODRUFF

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly and our DVDs fit nicely into it. Should have bought this long ago.
customer_reviews.author: goofball

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for all of our movies!
customer_reviews.text: needed lots of storage and found it for a great price! These were easy to assemble and adjustable shelves made for greater capacity!! Awesome price :)
customer_reviews.author: Robin Dimiceli

customer_reviews.title: count your dvd's first
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble and well made. a stout rack. I had dvd's and cd,s all over the place and just barely got them in and it is pretty big.
customer_reviews.author: TurnKey23

customer_reviews.title: NOT A WALL MOUNT SHELF
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent unit for a floor standing shelf. The title says Wall Media and I thought it would be the same as the 3 tier I bought that came with a wall mount. I thought wrong--with a cardboard back this unit is not sturdy enough to wall mount.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice looking and fairly sturdy shelving system
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting much as this was a rather cheap shelf. However I was pleasantly surprised. It is a nice looking and fairly sturdy shelving system.
customer_reviews.author: Nathanael Nunes

customer_reviews.title: Holds lots --excellent -- Not fine wood but it looks good- some screw holes misalligned ...
customer_reviews.text: Holds lots --excellent -- Not fine wood but it looks good- some screw holes misalligned at the edge causing splits.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Grundtisch

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and fits my needs very well.
customer_reviews.text: This product was easily assembled and was "solid" after assembly. The finish has the look and feel of a fine piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: SlydrVet

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: There was supposed to be 14 adjustable shelves but there was only 10 included. Part number SH-0214 Black. I got no answer from manufacturer yet. Please help me.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Gracik II

customer_reviews.title: ... and DVD's in my collection very well and looks good doing it
customer_reviews.text: Holds the large amount of CD's and DVD's in my collection very well and looks good doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Jayde

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant surprise
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat discouraging when opening the box, it turns out to be remarkably well made. A bit tricky to nail on the back cover, but with care, it works out just fine. Prepac's solution for tying the cabinet to the wall is very likely to be inadequate. Especially with it sitting on carpet, I ended up making 3/4-inch diameter aluminum spacer tubes and screws near each upper corner which made the cabinet very stable.
customer_reviews.author: Peter B.

customer_reviews.title: Only Flaw is setting up the backside
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rack for my NES collection and set it up myself. It was pretty easy to set up but putting the backside on was very difficult. I ended up doing a small amount of damage to the rack before I called it quits on that, but the damage was very minimal and barely noticeable. Plus I was going to put it by a wall anyway so it's no big loss. In all this will hold my collection nicely and if you're starting an NES collection or have on, this shelf should hold 368 games in all.
customer_reviews.author: Grust

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, installation easy, holds all my cd's, approx 650 and still left over space. Solved my storage issues, now all are in one place.
customer_reviews.author: randall moore

customer_reviews.title: Prepac Cherry Double Width Wall Media Storage Rack
customer_reviews.text: I recently ordered two of these units, similar to the oak triple unit I purchased a year ago. One of these units arrived with a couple of broken parts which the company in Canada replaced immediately (at no cost to me). These units are very well-made and look much more expensive than they really cost. I love these units to store paperback books, and even some hardback books on the bottom shelves. They are very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Proud to Speak English

customer_reviews.title: This thing is nice
customer_reviews.text: Glad I caught this on sale for $49.99. I came back to order another so that I can have two that match, but no way i'm paying $123. Still a well constructed tower
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It look good and does hold all of my CD's plus missalaneous items.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Minor

customer_reviews.title: Great way to conveniently store CDs/DVDs
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice, easy to put together, great option for CD/DVD collectors as quite a few fit and they are very accessible.
customer_reviews.author: Nina B.

customer_reviews.title: Great CD/DVD Storage Cabinet.
customer_reviews.text: Great storage for all my CD's and DVD's. Worked out fine.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't too difficult to put together. I bought it ...
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't too difficult to put together. I bought it for my new place, so I haven't filled it yet to be able to tell how many it will hold.
customer_reviews.author: Stoney Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly, just be sure to anchor it to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Got this bad boy on sale. It looks great, and it's very strudy. It doesn't look cheap. Highly recommend. Yep
customer_reviews.author: Mark G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for media storage. Will probably buy another one in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: More space than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a fairly large unit. It went together easily and looks good. It is particle board construction so not a lifetime product, but looks nice and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: s fit so very happy with the bookcase
customer_reviews.text: All of our DVD,s fit so very happy with the bookcase.
customer_reviews.author: Glenna Evans

customer_reviews.title: Dont Hold Quite as many tapes as it looks like
customer_reviews.text: I like this storage case except for the bottom shelf, no matter how you space the shelves the bottom isnt large enough to hold a standard DVD.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This shelf is pretty nice. It wasn't hard to assemble, for the most part. It holds a lot of cd's.
customer_reviews.author: Morgy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Perfect fit. Easy to put together. Won't be long before I'll need another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this piece would i would by this again in a heart beat you can not argue with the price
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Escar

customer_reviews.title: Prepac Wall Media Storage Rack
customer_reviews.text: I like this storage rack, and will probably order another one. It is not high grade furniture, but it does the job. They should send more nails for the back panel.
customer_reviews.author: John D Nash

customer_reviews.title: Be Aware
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three of these units. In all three of the boxes, each and every piece was completely covered with dirt and sawdust. The cheap coated finish is extremely thin and peels off with simple scotch tape. Entire product is made of press board.
customer_reviews.author: Pay Attention

customer_reviews.title: The only problem is it's taller than they said - ...
customer_reviews.text: The only problem is it's taller than they said - it's about 51.5", not 51" as stated in the description. I measured exactly, to have it fit under a thermostat, and it's just a tiny bit too tall to fit!! Of course I didn't find this out until the whole thing was assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Levin

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: This media shelf was a sinch to put together and looks great! For the price you can't beat this shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Don't let overwhelm stop you - this is great media storage!
customer_reviews.text: When you first open the box, prepare to be overwhelmed, because the shelves make it seem like it's in a thousand pieces, and the top, bottom, and sides are a little heavy. However if you can just move past the initial overwhelm, it's really not hard to put together, and it looks absolutely great while making the most of valuable storage space.
customer_reviews.author: L.I.

customer_reviews.title: Everything it was supposed to be.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product for the price. It looks good and holds tons of CDs. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Urban

customer_reviews.title: I would have expected a better quality product
customer_reviews.text: For the amount of money this cost, I would have expected a better quality product. Upon opening the box, the pieces seemed like they were put together in a very dusty environment. I had to wipe down each piece individually. While it was easy to assemble, I thought that the quality should have been better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most Excellent piece
customer_reviews.text: Setup was fairly easy, did it all on my own and required few tools. Looks nice and saved my a lot of room for my DVD collection.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Fizur

customer_reviews.title: When assembling, the particle board split into two when ...
customer_reviews.text: When assembling, the particle board split into two when only only the third step. Not uncommon with particle board, but wish it was more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Alaina Mann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the movie shelf! Now I am organized. Good size when you don't have a lot of space!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Erickson

product_meta.title: Prepac Cherry Double Width Wall Media (DVD,CD,Games) Storage Rack
product_meta.description: This "library style" multimedia storage unit, with central divider, is designed to accommodate any combination of media in a medium-sized collection. It makes efficient use of space and boasts a considerable amount of storage space in a relatively compact unit. Fully adjustable shelves can be set to any position to accommodate your collection and ensure full flexibility for any future changes. Tops and bases are made of profiled MDF and bases are enlarged for extra stability.
feature_bullets: Constructed from high quality laminated composite woods
